directions: In a bowl, mix the cream cheese, margarine, deviled ham meat spread, salt, dill weed, and mushrooms together until smooth. Spread mixture evenly over bread slices.
Broil on top oven rack for 3 to 5 minutes, or until lightly browned.  Watch carefully to prevent burning.
ingredients: 1 loaf French bread, halved lengthwise and sliced into 2 inch slices
1 (4 ounce) can deviled ham meat spread
title: Deviled Ham Broiled Sandwiches
